name: AVRoutePickerView
desc: A view that displays controls to select playback routes.

items.name: var delegate: AVRoutePickerViewDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object for the route picker.

items.name: protocol AVRoutePickerViewDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that defines the methods to adopt to respond to route picker view presentation events.

items.name: var activeTintColor: UIColor!
items.desc: The viewâ€™s tint color when AirPlay is active.

items.name: var isRoutePickerButtonBordered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the route picker button has a border.

items.name: var prioritizesVideoDevices: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the route picker sorts video output devices to the top of the list.

items.name: var routePickerButtonStyle: AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle
items.desc: The button style for the route picker.

items.name: enum AVRoutePickerViewButtonStyle
items.desc: Constants that define the button styles a route picker view supports.

items.name: func routePickerButtonColor(for: AVRoutePickerView.ButtonState) -> NSColor
items.desc: Returns the color of the picker button for the specified state.

items.name: func setRoutePickerButtonColor(NSColor?, for: AVRoutePickerView.ButtonState)
items.desc: Sets the route picker button color for the specified state.

items.name: enum AVRoutePickerView.ButtonState
items.desc: Constant values describing the available button states.

items.name: var player: AVPlayer?
items.desc: The player object for which to perform routing operations.
